com.box.sdk

Class SharedLinkAPIConnection

  • Object
    • BoxAPIConnection
      • SharedLinkAPIConnection
  • Deprecated. 
    Use BoxItem.getSharedItem(BoxAPIConnection, String, String, String...) instead

    public class SharedLinkAPIConnection
extends BoxAPIConnection
    This API connection uses a shared link (along with an optional password) to authenticate with the Box API. It wraps a preexisting BoxAPIConnection in order to provide additional access to items that are accessible with a shared link.

      • getBaseURL

        public String getBaseURL()
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from class: BoxAPIConnection
        Gets the base URL that's used when sending requests to the Box API. The URL is created from BoxAPIConnection.baseURL and BoxAPIConnection.API_VERSION. The default value is "https://api.box.com/2.0/".
        Overrides:

        Returns:
        the base URL.

      • setBaseURL

        public void setBaseURL(String baseURL)
        Deprecated. 
        Description copied from class: BoxAPIConnection
        Sets the base URL to be used when sending requests to the Box API. For example, the default base URL is "https://api.box.com/". This method changes how BoxAPIConnection.getRevokeURL() and BoxAPIConnection.getTokenURL() are constructed.
        Overrides:
        setBaseURL in class BoxAPIConnection
        Parameters:
        baseURL - a base URL
